content: Two software security companies have launched a full-scale attack on the patents they are currently accused of infringing by patent licensor Intellectual Ventures  urging a U.S. court to cancel them because they should never have been granted in the first place.
name: Symantec Corporation
title: Symantec and Trend Micro attack Intellectual Ventures patents

content: Though a Delaware federal jury last month awarded patent licensor Intellectual Ventures far less than the $298 million it had been seeking in infringement damages against security software maker Symantec Corp  a judge Wednesday said he is inclined to cut the amount even further.
name: Symantec Corporation
title: Judge hints at slashing Intellectual Ventures win against Symantec

content: Feb 6 Symantec Corp  maker of the popular Norton antivirus software  was ordered to pay $17 million in damages on Friday after a federal jury in Delaware found it had violated two patents owned by Intellectual Ventures  a major patent licensing company.
name: Symantec Corporation
title: U.S. court orders Symantec to pay $17 mln for patent infringement

content: Feb 6 Symantec Corp  maker of the popular Norton antivirus software  was ordered to pay $17 million in damages on Friday after a federal jury in Delaware found it had violated two patents owned by Intellectual Ventures  a major patent licensing company.
name: Symantec Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-U.S. court orders Symantec to pay $17 mln for patent infringement

content: Symantec Corp   best known for its Norton antivirus software  announced a new $1 billion share buyback program on Thursday.
name: Symantec Corporation
title: Symantec announces $1 billion share buyback plan

content: Feb 5 Symantec Corp  best known for its Norton antivirus software  announced a new $1 billion share buyback program on Thursday.
name: Symantec Corporation
title: Symantec announces $1 bln share buyback plan
